>

>

> something wrong? I'm a magician and have the elmental
> grimore which has 4 slots, should i put something
> in all four slots or do we just use 2(one word and
> one component). Can anyone answer that for me?
>
> Does anyone have a good site to go to that explains
> reasearch? I sure cant find one.
>
> Thanks
